text.description:
In this video, my friend and Las Vegas food expert Phil Tzeng @lasvegasfill is taking me on a culinary journey that not only promises but delivers an epic saga of taste, tradition, and excellence. First we are going to what I think is Las Vegas's #1 A5 Wagyu Shabu Shabu and a hidden gem 15-course Japanese Kaiseki dinner.
Restaurants we went to: Mikiya Wagyu Shabu House Address: 5728 Rosemead Blvd #107, Temple City, CA 91780 Kaiseki Yuzu Address: 3900 Spring Mountain Rd #A5, Las Vegas, NV 89102
Thanks to Phil for showing me around! Phil's Instagram: @lasvegasfill Phil's Tiktok: @lasvegasfill
➔ Get tickets to the best show on earth!!! http://bit.ly/2gu7REI
✸ Strictly Dumpling T-Shirts HERE: http://bit.ly/2IVM2ts
➣ Subscribe for MORE videos about food! http://bit.ly/1hsxh41 ➣ Subscribe to my Vlog Channel! https://bit.ly/2FJOGo1 ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ★↓FOLLOW ME ON SOCIAL MEDIA!↓★ Facebook Show Page: https://www.facebook.com/strictlydumpling Facebook Mike Fan Page: https://www.facebook.com/mikeychenx Twitter: http://twitter.com/Mikexingchen ------------------------------------- ♫ Music from: Epidemic Sound http://www.epidemicsound.com
text.fulltitle: Las Vegas's #1 BEST A5 Wagyu Shabu Hotpot & 15 COURSE EPIC Japanese Kaiseki Dinner with Phil Tzeng
text.tags: Las Vegas dining; A5 Wagyu; Shabu Shabu; Japanese Kaiseki; gourmet experience; culinary art; epic dining; luxury cuisine; Vegas eats; foodie adventure; fine dining; gastronomy; world class cuisine; a5 hotpot; wagyu hotpot; best vegas hotpot; best las vegas hotpot; las vegas hotpot; las vegas; las vegas food; food; all you can eat; buffet; hotpot buffet;
